intro.text: You open a book that isn’t on any shelf. Its pages are blank until you look at them—then they fill with choices you haven’t made yet.

learn_choices.text: A voice—calm, patient—explains: every node is a moment. Every choice points forward. Effects shape the traveler, not the text.

ending_good_ready.text: The book warms in your hands. You don’t know what waits in the next story, but you understand the rules well enough to survive—and to create.

ending.summary: You complete onboarding and unlock the VerseCraft mindset.

ending_ambiguous_step_in.text: You step into a page mid-sentence. The world around you finishes the thought. You’re in the story now—and you don’t get to ask how it works until you choose.

ending.summary: You skip the tutorial and learn by living the consequences.

ending_bad_closed.text: You close the book. The room feels smaller immediately, as if possibilities have been removed from the air. For now, you remain outside the stories.

ending.summary: You reject the system and lose access to the worlds.
